DataElement.preferredName: Treatment Plan Surgical Procedure Sequence Order Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A number that identifies the order in which surgical  therapy will be performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Treatment Plan Surgical Procedure Sequence Number
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A document outlining the essential treatment issues which will be addressed. This may include the problem to be addressed, the proposed treatment, the treatment goal, the time frame to meet goals, and an estimate of the costs._A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery._A number that identifies the ordering relations (in time, space, etc.) in a set of objects or events.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A document outlining the essential treatment issues which will be addressed. This may include the problem to be addressed, the proposed treatment, the treatment goal, the time frame to meet goals, and an estimate of the costs.

Concepts.definition: A document outlining the essential treatment issues which will be addressed. This may include the problem to be addressed, the proposed treatment, the treatment goal, the time frame to meet goals, and an estimate of the costs.

Property.preferredDefinition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.:A number that identifies the ordering relations (in time, space, etc.) in a set of objects or events.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A logical or comprehensible arrangement of separate elements; a condition of regular or proper arrangement._A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.: Planned; devised, contrived, or formed in design.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
To devise, contrive, or form in design.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Following the third position in an ordering or series; coming next after the third and just before the fifth in position.

Concepts.definition: Following the third position in an ordering or series; coming next after the third and just before the fifth in position.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Following the second position in an ordering or series; coming next after the second and just before the fourth in position.

Concepts.definition: Following the second position in an ordering or series; coming next after the second and just before the fourth in position.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude.

Concepts.definition: Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A logical or comprehensible arrangement of separate elements.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A logical or comprehensible arrangement of separate elements; a condition of regular or proper arrangement.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
